title: AI Poker Camp Course
text:
Coming soon:

Beta Jul 8-Aug 8 in SF
Beta v2 Aug 19-Sep 19 in NYC
Full Course Sep 24-Nov 26 virtually

title: Poker Camp
text:
Poker Camp is a program to learn about probability, game theory, AI, and decision making under uncertainty through the lens of poker.
Our first camp will take place from Jul 8 to Aug 8 in person in San Francisco! Click here to sign up.

Note that the programming and related materials/workshops are for educational purposes and will not use any real money.

title: Poker Camp Signup
text:
The first ever AI Poker Camp (beta) will take place in person in San Francisco for 5 weeks starting Jul 8 and ending Aug 8.
Each week will have evening meetings on Mondays and Thursdays from 6:00-8:00pm.
Location is TBD in San Francisco


In 2017, an AI poker bot beat some of the best human players in a 1v1 match. Our camp will begin by learning about the algorithm behind that bot.
The camp is centered around 6 projects that challenge you to think strategically about making decisions under uncertainty.
The projects involve a variety of game formats from poker to rock paper scissors to unusual hybrid games. We’ll learn about both game theory optimal strategies and opponent modeling to build strategies against a population of agents with varying skill.
The expected time commitment is about 10 hours per week including 4 hours per week of in-person meetings.



Signup Form
We are requesting that each participant sign up with at least 1 partner
The cost for the camp is $100 per person with an optional $20 pre-camp Poker Basics workshop on Sun Jul 7.
Payment Link
After signing up and completing payment, we will be in touch with details.
If financially prohibitive, let us know and we’ll try to work something out.
If you’d rather pay with Venmo or Zelle, email for info.




Poker: Useful for context, but ok without. We are offering a 2 hour Poker Basics workshop on Sun Jul 7 for a $20 supplement.
Coding: Python
Machine learning: Something





Ross Rheingans-Yoo: Former Jane Street trader and instructor
Max Chiswick: Former pro online poker player, creator of AI Poker Tutorial





Join our Discord
Email





AI Poker Camp 5 week beta NYC starting Aug 19
Poker Camp 5 week beta virtual starting Aug 21
Poker Camp 10 week virtual starting Sep 23
AI Poker Camp 10 week virtual starting Sep 24
More to be announced

title: About
text: Poker Camp is a project by Max Chiswick and Ross Rheingans-Yoo.

title: About
text:
Mission
To build the best program to teach practical reasoning under uncertainty

title: About
text:
Max bio

2008-2012: Online poker pro on PokerStars
2017: MSc with thesis on AI poker at Technion Israel Institute of Technology with Nahum Shimkin
2019 and 2022: Two poker research papers with Sam Ganzfried

title: About
text:
Contribute
We are in the process of becoming a 501(c)(3) nonprofit. If you are interested in contributing, please see our .org site: https://pokercamp.org.
